title: MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
message:
The machine is running slow and the fan is running fast. 

We have inspected the board, under a microscope and thermal cam and nothing looks unusual, nor shorted. 

Kindly advice.

title: MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
message:
Any history available?

ALS works?
Test first disconnecting webcam.
You should also try known good LIO and trackpad flex/board.

title: MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
message:
Unfortunately no history at all, as per the Mac owner "It just happened". 

ALS works. 
Already tried by first disconnecting the webcam. 
Already tried a known good LIO & trackpad flex/board.

title: MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
message:
Same symptom disconnecting battery?

Try clean ME BIOS.

title: MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
message: Is a Mac programming tool necessary to clean ME BIOS?

title: MacBook Air 11" 2014 A1465 Fan Running Fast & Machine Running Slow
message:
Medusa progammer can do it onboard.
If not available, remove SPI chip (U6100) and flash this one for test:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/13uGw4JJqRRMxwH7KOdDJmFpOcIhgzsX5/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
